Package gov.usgs.alarm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alarm
    This class is the main class for the alarm process.
    AlarmChecker
    This class checks on the state of the Alarm thread and if its state is not 1 list the state.
    CommandStatusServer
    This server accepts connections and commands "Pings", "QDPings", "EdgeMom Status" and "Execute" and more returns the output from their respective clients.
    DBMessageServer
    The DBMessageServer takes messages of a particular form and creates an SQL statement to insert data into the given database and table,setting the fields given.
    EdgemomConfigInstanceThread
    This is a 24/7 thread which monitors changes in the edge database for changes that require reconfiguration of an edge/cwb node.
    EdgemomConfigThread
    This is a 24/7 thread which monitors changes in the edge database for changes that require reconfiguration of an edge/cwb node.
    EventHandler
    EventHandler - accepts static declaration of events, creates event handlers for each instance of an event (this includes node and process).
    EventInputer
    This class is the super class to any inputer of events.
    EventMonitorServer
    EventMonitorServer.java - This class is a Server Template which dumps a line for each active event/node to the caller.
    HughesNOCChecker
    This thread using ping to the Hughes NOCs to test that the VPNs are up.
    LatencyServer
    This server sends a string channel information for a station or all stations to any client.
    MakeEtcHosts
    This class maintains the /etc/hosts file for computers and stations at the NEIC using the database to get hostnames and ip addresses in the DB.
    MakeVsatRoutes
    MakeVsatRoutes.java - This reads the MySQL tcpconnections records, compares its IP and link information against the output of a "netstat -nr" command and makes routing table changes based on the results.
    MonitorPort
    This class monitors services from a QueryMom, EdgeMom or any other process that provide a MonitorServer with key value pairs.
    MultiThreadedTrapReceiver  
    PanicThread
    This thread is a permanent one which if armed, waits a timeout interval and if it is not disarmed, causes a SendEvent.edgeSMEEvent("PanicThrTO",...
    PingListener
    This class sends pings to the given IP and keeps a static TreeMap of all of these listeners.
    POCServer
    This task handles POC messages from Q330s with dynamic IP addresses and DB status update requests through a message queue.
    QDPing
    This class sends a QDPing to a Q330 which causes the Q330 to return a UDP response.
    QDPingManager
    Thread that pings Q330s and tracks their status.
    QueryMomMonitor
    This class monitors services from a QueryMom - QueryServer, CWBWaveServer - It needs to know the IP of the Server, the ports for the two services, and a list of channels to use in testing.
    SendEvent
    This class allows and event to get sent to the alarm system.
    SendEventRelay
    This class will relay UDP alarm packets to another alarm server.
    SNWChannelClient
    This take the inputs from the UdpChannel collection of channel latency and flow and does database updates of
    SNWGroupEventProcess
    This class built the original events for the SNW groups.
    UdpChannel
    This program creates a UDP listener for Channel data using the UDPProcess class.
    UdpEventProcess
    This class receives UDP packets for the alarm system and passes them to the HandleEvents threads which implement the paging and email.
    UDPHeartBeat
    This thread sends a UdpPacket from bound port for Alarm, to port 6334 (default) at a remote site.
    WebStationClient
    This class populates the WebStation netops_station table in one or more databases.
